title: "Tech Startup Develops RFID with Sensor Intelligence for Elder Care, Homes"
excerpt: "XO2Tech, a technology startup based in Spain and the United States, has developed a wireless system employing radio frequency identification technology and sensors to help manage the activities and conditions of the elderly or other individuals as they interact with items in their home or care facility."
